game.name: Psycho
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, Free To Play
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 끝없는 악몽에 갇혀, 저주받은 그 밤을 반복해서 경험하고 있습니다. 집을 탈출할 때마다 현실은 초기화됩니다. 슬픔에 사로잡히고 끊임없는 존재에게 쫓기며, 뒤틀린 퍼즐을 풀고 진실을 마주하여 이 순환을 끊을 수 있을까요?
game.shortDescriptionEn: You’re trapped in an endless nightmare, reliving the same haunted night over and over. Every time you escape your house, reality resets. Haunted by grief and stalked by a relentless presence, can you solve the twisted puzzles and face the truth to break the loop?
